Ethiopia. The Community Based Nutrition Programme (CBN), as part of the National Nutrition 
Programme, was initiated in 2008 and continues today ( 36). Population coverage in target 
areas (now approximately 250/640 woredas (districts)) is approximately 40% and intensity of 
CHWs is about 1:23 children, estimated as 0.2 FTEs, i.e. 86:1000 households (37). Estimates of 
reduction in underweight from the CBN programme are preliminary, derived from an initial analysis
